message.content:
<teammate-message teammate_id="team-lead" summary="Read Translator's Preface, send feedback to me">
ALL TEAM MEMBERS EXCEPT translator-2:

Please read the Translator's Preface draft at:
`/Users/el/Dropbox/10.Kernel/11.Vault/Tower/L. Legenravend/49 Workspace/Translator/Draft/Translators-Preface.md`

After reading, send your comments and feedback **to me** (not to translator-2). Focus on:
- Accuracy of philosophical framing
- Whether key translation decisions are well-explained for the reader
- Any factual errors or mischaracterizations from your domain expertise
- Clarity and readability
- Anything missing that should be addressed

translator-2: You are excluded from this task â€” please disregard.
</teammate-message>

content.text: Understood. I am excluded from this review task and will wait for further instructions.
